replies.msg:
雖然我係英國 但依然會出嚟
當地時間4點先開始（香港時間夜晚11點）


【行動升級】倫敦反送中集會遊行 - 中國大使館至香港駐倫敦經濟貿易辦事處
【London Call To Action】Anti-Extradition Bill March from Chinese Embassy to Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office

日期：2019年6月9日（星期日）
時間：下午 4 時至 6 時
集合地點：倫敦中國大使館外 (49 Portland Place, W1B 1JL)
[流程]
4:00pm: 於中國大使館外集會。屆時主辦單位 D4HK 代表、香港社運人仕及其他講者會作簡短發言。
5:00pm: 遊行隊伍開始由中國大使館出發，前往香港駐倫敦經濟貿易辦事處。
5:30pm: 遊行隊伍抵達 香港駐倫敦經濟貿易辦事處門外，各人發言後結束。

Date: 9 June 2019 (Sun)
Time: 4 - 6pm
Place: Outside the Chinese Embassy (49 Portland Place, W1B 1JL)
[Rundown]
4:00pm: Gather opposite the Chinese Embassy. Short speeches by D4HK, HK activists, and others.
5:00pm: Begin marching from the Chinese Embassy to HKETO.
5:30pm: Finish at HKETO with end speeches.


[其他資訊]
建議衣著 - 黑衣 (與全球各地聲援香港的活動統一)
參加者可自行設計海報或單張，或於在本專頁下載及列印可由全球港人設計的宣傳海報。
遊行期間有義工擔任糾察，請遵從他們的指示，保障大家的安全。
根據警方指引，遊行隊伍不會沿途派發宣傳單張 。
如參加者行動不便，需要協助，可聯絡 D4HK。

[Other Info & Accessibility]
- Recommended dress code is black, to synchronise with solidarity protests around the world.
- Please print out the banners we have provided, or you are very welcome to make your own! We will prepare copies but there may not be enough to go round.
- The rally at the Chinese Embassy will be static. After the speeches, we will be marching slowly from the Chinese Embassy to HKETO. We will have several volunteers guiding protesters to stay on the pavement. On arriving at HKETO, we will chant slogans and make short speeches before ending the protest.
- We will not be distributing information leaflets to the public while marching (as requested by the police).
- If you have mobility issues and require additional assistance, please do not hesitate to contact D4HK and we will try our best to accommodate your needs.




到時我會係到圖片直播
